1001074.1000851.1000857.1000954.specialinteriorcolorflag=false 1001074.1000851.1000867.1000977.specialinteriorcolorflag=false 1001074.1000851.1000866.1000943.title=Ball Mount [installed_msrp] 1001074.1002622.1000866.1000944.msrp=105.00 1001074.1000851.1000852.1001033.description=Headed to the mountains? Maybe the lake or seashore? Be sure to bring along your toys. And to make towing easier, this Toyota ball mount is engineered specifically for the 4Runner:
•Ball placement maintains optimum vehicle departure angle
•Powder topcoat helps protect against UV rays so it looks like new, mile after mile
•Lab and on-road testing ensures the quality and durability of the entire towing system
•Trailer ball sold separately

Before towing, confirm your vehicle and trailer are compatible, hooked up and loaded properly and that you have any necessary additional equipment. Do not exceed any Weight Ratings and follow all instructions in your Owner’s Manual. The maximum you can tow depends on the total weight of any cargo, occupants and available equipment. 1001074.1002622.1000858.1000947.title=Ball Mount fsa 1001074.1000851.1000857.1000950.derived=false 1001074.1000851.1000856.1000936.option=false 1001074.1000851.1000852.1001029.group=Exterior 1001074.1000851.1000869.1000912.alacarte=true 1001074.1000851.1000865.1000980.secondaryfeatures= 1001074.1000851.1000869.1000912.secondaryfeatures= 1001074.1000851.1000856.description=The fun of owning an FJ? Bringing along your toys. This ball mount is designed specifically to match your FJ’s towing capacity, all while measuring up to Toyota’s exacting performance standards:
•Optimized ball placement for precise drop/rise to maintain the optimum vehicle departure angle
•Powder topcoat helps protect against UV rays to maintain its long-term appearance
•On-road, real-world testing ensures the quality and durability of the entire towing system
•Trailer ball sold separately

Before towing, confirm your vehicle and trailer are compatible, hooked up and loaded properly and that you have any necessary additional equipment. Do not exceed any Weight Ratings and follow all instructions in your Owner’s Manual. What do you haul? Dirt bikes? Watercraft? A little bit of everything? Well then, this Toyota ball mount is the perfect addition to your Tacoma:
•Ball placement provides precise drop/rise to help maintain optimum vehicle departure angle
•Powder coating helps protect against UV rays while maintaining a "like-new" appearance
•Tested in real world conditions to help ensure the quality and durability of the entire towing system
•Meets or exceeds industry towing standards
•Trailer ball sold separately

Before towing, confirm your vehicle and trailer are compatible, hooked up and loaded properly and that you have any necessary additional equipment. Do not exceed any Weight Ratings and follow all instructions in your Owner’s Manual. The maximum you can tow depends on the total weight of any cargo, occupants and available equipment.

Not all models can tow 5,000 lbs.
